Hi all,

I just received from the JSSUS my copies of my books -- Sue-Koto,  
Japanese Swords of the 15th and 16th Centuries, which are available  
for the price of $50 for the two volumes. I don't know how they can  
afford to give these away like this. Anyway, you can contact Harry  
Watson for them, all 725 pages worth.

Gordon
